name: G. Geometric Balance
input: InputThe first line of the input contains a single integer $$$n\;(1 \le n \le 50000)$$$ — the number of commands Ivan has given.The next $$$n$$$ lines contain commands. Each command is one of:  "rotate $$$a$$$" ($$$45 \le a \le 360$$$) where $$$a$$$ is divisible by $$$45$$$;  "draw $$$d$$$" ($$$1 \le d \le 10^9$$$);  "move $$$d$$$" ($$$1 \le d \le 10^9$$$). At least one and at most 2000 of the commands are draw. It is guaranteed that no segment of the plane will be covered by ink more than once.
output: OutputOutput a single number, the answer to the question. The answer always exists.
